Description:
Job PurposeResponsible for ensuring the smooth and efficient operations of Danish Bakery outlets. They play a crucial role in maintaining quality standards, maximizing profitability, and delivering exceptional experiences to customers. With a focus on operational excellence, the Multi-Unit Manager oversees daily operations, manages resources effectively, and drives continuous improvement.Key Roles and ResponsibilitiesMulti-Unit Manager ActivitiesOperations ManagementAssist the Senior Operations Manager in developing and implementing operational strategies for Danish Bakery outlets.
Oversee daily operations, including opening and closing procedures, inventory management, and staff scheduling.
Monitor inventory levels regularly, collaborating with relevant teams to maintain optimal stock levels and minimize wastage.
Ensure proper maintenance and cleanliness of the bakery facility.
Oversee equipment maintenance and repairs to ensure smooth operations.Financial ManagementAssist in the development of annual budgets and revenue targets for each Danish Bakery outlet.
Monitor financial performance, including sales, costs, and profitability.
Identify areas for cost optimization and implement appropriate measures.
Ensure accurate cash handling procedures and monitor cash flow.Product Development and Quality ControlCollaborate with the Senior Operations Manager and culinary team in developing and enhancing bakery product offerings.
Conduct regular quality checks to ensure adherence to brand standards and customer satisfaction.
Implement and maintain standardized recipes and portion control measures.
Ensure compliance with health, safety, and sanitation regulations.
Monitor the quality of bakery products, ensuring consistency and adherence to brand standardsMerchandising and DisplayDevelop and implement effective merchandising strategies to enhance product visibility and attract customers.
Coordinate with outlet managers to ensure appealing and organized product displays.
Monitor inventory levels and freshness of displayed items, adjusting as necessary.
Collaborate with the marketing team to create eye-catching promotional displays and signage.Customer Service and Sales MonitoringMonitor customer service and sales activities in Danish Bakery outlets to ensure exceptional service delivery and sales performance.
Implement strategies to enhance customer satisfaction and drive sales growth.
Track and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs) related to customer service and sales.
Generate reports and provide insights to the Operations Manager regarding team performance and areas for improvement.Monitoring Competition and Continuous ImprovementStay updated on industry trends, market conditions, and competition in the bakery sector.
Conduct regular competitor analysis and recommend strategies to maintain a competitive edge.
Identify opportunities for continuous improvement in operations, processes, and service delivery.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement improvements and drive operational excellence.Team Leadership and Performance ManagementCreate work schedules, manage shifts, and ensure adequate staffing levels.
Manage and provide guidance to the teams in Danish Bakery outlets.
Assist in setting performance expectations, establishing goals, and motivating the team to achieve targets.
Conduct regular performance evaluations, provide feedback, and implement performance improvement plans when necessary.
Coordinate training and development programs to enhance the skills and knowledge of the staff.Skills
